idea-plugin.name: Java8 Generators
idea-plugin.description: Enhanced Java toString(), hashcode() and equals() methods generator. Java 8 native features are used. No additional dependencies.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Release 1.0: Initial release.
Release 1.0.1: Changed IntelliJ version compatibility to support legacy releases.

action.description: Generates an implementation of equals() and hashCode() using Java 8 features
Generates an implementation of toString using Java 8 features
